title: Prosciutto
description: Introducing the 'Prosciutto' pizza â€” a culinary masterpiece featuring a velvety base of Creamy Alfredo Sauce. Topped with ripe tomatoes, gooey mozzarella, and aged Parmesan, this pizza reaches gourmet heights with thinly sliced prosciutto adding a touch of saltiness. Fresh arugula crowns the ensemble, providing a crisp and peppery finish. Indulge in a symphony of flavors, where each bite is a celebration of culinary excellence
ingredients: Creamy Alfredo Sauce (Base), tomato, mozzarella, parmesan, arugula

title: Mortadella
description: Introducing the 'Mortadella' pizza, a culinary delight that transcends ordinary flavors. This masterpiece begins with a luscious base of Creamy Alfredo Sauce, setting the stage for a symphony of taste. Melt-in-your-mouth mozzarella blankets the canvas, while sun-dried tomatoes and capers add bursts of tangy and briny notes. The finishing touch is a scattering of fresh arugula, providing a peppery and crisp contrast. The Mortadella pizza is a harmonious blend of creamy, savory, and zesty elements, delivering a truly extraordinary culinary experience in every bite
ingredients: Creamy Alfredo Sauce (Base), mozzarella, sun-dried tomatoes, capers, arugula

title: Pear Dorblu
description: Introducing the 'Pear Dorblu' pizza, a divine blend of sweet and savory flavors. This culinary masterpiece features a luscious base of Creamy Alfredo Sauce, providing the perfect canvas for the luxurious duo of dorblu and mozzarella. Sliced pears lend a touch of natural sweetness, while crunchy walnuts add a delightful texture. Each bite of the Pear Dorblu pizza is a symphony of creamy, tangy, and nutty notes, creating an unforgettable culinary experience that captures the essence of gourmet indulgence
ingredients: Creamy Alfredo Sauce (Base), dorblu, mozzarella, pear, walnut

title: Mutton Kebab
description: A tantalizing fusion of flavors, the Mutton Kebab pizza boasts a Tomato Sauce base adorned with parsley, bell peppers, fresh tomatoes, and a generous layer of mozzarella. The star of the show is succulent lamb kebab, perfectly complemented by the smoky notes of grilled eggplant
ingredients: Tomato Sauce (Base), parsley, bell pepper, tomato, mozzarella, lamb kebab, eggplant

title: Pepperoni in Hawai
description: Embark on a taste adventure with the Pepperoni in Hawai pizza. Featuring a Tomato Sauce base, smoked chicken, and classic pepperoni salami, the tropical twist comes from the addition of sweet pineapple chunks. All this goodness is generously blanketed in gooey mozzarella
ingredients: Tomato Sauce (Base), smoked chicken, pepperoni salami, pineapple, mozzarella

title: Teriyaki
description: Transport your taste buds to the Far East with the Teriyaki pizza. A Tomato Sauce base provides the backdrop for smoked chicken, pepperoni salami, and pineapple, creating a delightful fusion of flavors. Topped with mozzarella, this pizza offers a savory and sweet symphony
ingredients: Tomato Sauce (Base), smoked chicken, pepperoni salami, pineapple, mozzarella

title: Four Cheese
description: Indulge in the decadence of the Four Cheese pizza. A velvety base of Creamy Alfredo Sauce sets the stage for the exquisite blend of dor blue, mozzarella, parmesan, and cheddar. Each bite is a journey into the richness of multiple cheeses, creating a true cheese lover's delight
ingredients: Creamy Alfredo Sauce (Base), dor blue, mozzarella, parmesan, cheddar

title: Chicken & Ham
description: The Chicken & Ham pizza is a savory delight with a Tomato Sauce base hosting a flavorful ensemble of ham, smoked chicken, bell peppers, and mozzarella. This classic combination promises a satisfying medley of textures and tastes in every slice
ingredients: Tomato Sauce (Base), ham, smoked chicken, bell pepper, mozzarella

title: Mushroom
description: Immerse yourself in the earthy goodness of the Mushroom pizza. Tomato Sauce forms the base for parsley, mozzarella, and honey mushrooms, creating a simple yet delectable harmony of flavors that celebrates the natural essence of mushrooms
ingredients: Tomato Sauce (Base), parsley, mozzarella, honey mushrooms

title: Hawaiian
description: Embrace the timeless Hawaiian pizza, featuring a Tomato Sauce base, smoked chicken, sweet pineapple chunks, and mozzarella. This classic combination strikes the perfect balance between savory and sweet, delivering a taste of the tropics in every bite
ingredients: Tomato Sauce (Base), smoked chicken, pineapple, mozzarella

title: Super Meat
description: Satisfy your carnivorous cravings with the Super Meat pizza. A Tomato Sauce base supports a hearty ensemble of ham, Italian sausage, pepperoni salami, and meatball, all generously topped with mozzarella. A meat lover's dream come true
ingredients: Tomato Sauce (Base), ham, Italian sausage, pepperoni salami, mozzarella, meatball

title: Margarita
description: Experience pizza perfection with the Margarita, showcasing a Tomato Sauce base adorned with succulent tomato slices and a generous layer of mozzarella. This timeless classic lets the simplicity of quality ingredients shine through

title: Chicken BBQ
description: Revel in the smoky sweetness of the Chicken BBQ pizza. Featuring a BBQ Sauce base, crispy bacon, and mozzarella, this pizza delivers a delightful combination of barbecue flavors that will leave you craving more

title: Diablo
description: Brace yourself for the fiery intensity of the Diablo pizza. With a Hot Tabasco Sauce base, this bold creation boasts Italian sausages, Vienna sausages, Bavarian sausages, and pepperoni salami, all smothered in mozzarella. A spicy adventure for the brave.
ingredients: Hot Tabasco Sauce (Base), Italian sausages, Vienna sausages, Bavarian sausages, pepperoni salami, mozzarella

title: Mexico
description: Take a journey to Mexico with this vibrant pizza. A Tomato Sauce base provides the backdrop for jalapeno peppers, smoked chicken, corn, fresh tomatoes, and mozzarella. This lively combination captures the essence of Mexican flavors in every savory bite
ingredients: Tomato Sauce (Base), jalapeno pepper, smoked chicken, corn, tomato, mozzarella
